attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the prime minister has already started this when he came into power totally unelected. he should complete the process fully, end the normal democratic way of choosing a leader and declare himself "Hereditary Dictator and Supreme Ruler of Scotland and Other Territories." this way he will have the title to match his 'third world - banana republic - tinpot despot' approach to ruling the country.
(seriously - this isn't meant as a joke.)

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
